univendas.title: Univendas
description: Automated report generation for business decision-making using Python;
Provided internal support by troubleshooting hardware and software issues;
Performed maintenance and management of Windows servers;
Created and modified users, computers, GPOs, and other domain configurations.

inovai.title: Inov.AI
description: Developed Python-based solutions focused on data analysis and extraction from legal documents;
Implemented automations using Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQL Server, ElasticSearch, and Kubernetes;
Created and maintained an internal knowledge base application using Angular, TypeScript, ElasticSearch, and CSS;
Developed and maintained a monitoring BOT integrated with Telegram using Python;
Worked remotely throughout the entire period as part of the company's development team.
